detaileddescription.para: This function implements the NFS4_OP_LOCKU operation.

parameterdescription.para: [INOUT] Pointer to the compound request's data

simplesect.para: NFS4_OK if successfull, other values show an error.

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_op_locku_Free: frees what was allocared to handle nfs4_op_locku.
Frees what was allocared to handle nfs4_op_locku.

briefdescription.para: Routines used for managing the NFS4 COMPOUND functions.
